text:
*Hello  everyone* 
I can get contact by email using API v1, V3 , but couldn't find any way to do so via v4.

Is there a solution ? thanks
You cannot use JS in email templates.
I haven’t seen any documentation on this. I assume there isn’t as you’re not meant to use them, and it could be risky as HS could change them at any time.
HI <@U0516MVFDC2> sorry for the delay. Yes, It's rendered just like that
Or if anyone from <#CJ5DN6RKP|email-development> is available, see the message above

Thanks for your reply.  To correct myself, actually it's hubl not js. Like" Set country_name = contact.company_country.value"

When  I   set "isEnabledForEmailV3Rendering: true" , the email send out just fine and the logic working ok, but user can't edit the email content on the web-editor.

When I removed the "isEnabledForEmailV3Rendering" statement, the logic doesn't work anymore, but user can now edit the email content.

Is there any trick around here that we can do ?

Use a custom email module. Access the contact related properties and use them as HubL variables in your HTML. Worked for me and my click has been tracked. Tracking for iOS mail is limited, remember that
I can‘t provide you the code example, because I am not at work until end of week
